citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:45 pm on 04-
AUG-2022.
Made a phone call to the IACUC point of contact. No one was on-site or available to come to the facility at the time of the
attempt to inspect.
